name: Millennium Restaurant
description: This is one of the more upmarket eating establishments on Vauxhall. It looks clean and professional: tiled and terrazzo floors, glass windows and an extensive, clearly printed menu on the wall. You can order from the menu but most of the food is already prepared: mounds of fried rice, plain samba rice, biriyani, nasi goreng, curries, veg.
tip: A plus is that most of what they offer is already prepared, so if you're not ordering off the menu, they serve your food in front of you. This means you can adjust and alter quantities to suit your tastes and appetite – the amount of rice in pre-packed lunches can be overwhelming. They also cater for large functions. Call them on 0777633031.
review:
This is one of the more upmarket eating establishments on Vauxhall. It looks clean and professional: tiled and terrazzo floors, glass windows and an extensive, clearly printed menu on the wall. You can order from the menu but most of the food is already prepared: mounds of fried rice, plain samba rice, biriyani, nasi goreng, curries, veg.

මෙය වොක්ෂෝල් වීදියේ තරමක් ඉහළ පෙළේ බොජුන්හලක්. එය පිරිසිදුයි, වෘත්තික මට්ටමේ තැනක්. ටයිල් හා ටෙරාසෝ අතුරපු බිම. වීදුරු ජනෙල් හා පුළුල්, පැහැදිලිව මුද්‍රණය කර බිත්තියේ සවිකළ මෙනුපත. ඔබට මෙනුපතින් බලා කෑම ඇණවුම් කළහැකියි. ඒත්, බොහොමයක් ඒවා පිසිනලද ආහාර. ෆ්‍රයිඩ්රයිස්, සම්බා බත්, බුරියානි, නාසිගුරාං, ව්‍යංජන හා එළවළු ආදිය.
